title: Lagging
body: Hi there, I just logged in to play ranked to find out I am playing at 125 - 200 ping and sadly I lost. I play from nz and I don't know why this happening. After the game I did everything from restarting the modem to restarting the client and still on the same ping. I usually get 34 ping. Is anyone else facing this issue?

replies.body: hey, you're not alone lol.... Me and my friends, we are all suffering from the increasing ping. After the updated patches, the ping increased and increased :/ its saddening since we can't play smoothly as we could back then. i hope rito fix the problem with high pings soon T_________T{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Internet service in nz is not entirely reliable, probs just wait it out.
Yes, pretty much the same. Was fine for me yesterday. Problem today. Every one on my team had the same issue.
